nodes.bodyText: You're not using these variables outside the scope of the if-statement, so just put them in the if-statement.
Since that else is pretty much the last line, you can just remove it, and put return 0.
Can just initialize multiplier to 1.0 in the beginning to avoid this. Doesn't really make it less readable.
Can just initialize multiplier to 1.0 to avoid the else statement.
This variable is assigned within specific scopes and not used outside of them, so it's best to initialize it within the appropriate scopes instead of here.
